name: Candy Diamond
description:
Candy Diamond is a puzzle game that involves matching groups of gems to score points. The objective of the game is to collect at least three gems of the same shape in a row or column, which causes them to disappear and new gems to fall from the top of the screen. As the player progresses through the game, the difficulty level increases and the gems may become harder to match.

The game is timed, adding an element of urgency and challenge to the gameplay. The player must match as many gems as possible within the allotted time to achieve the highest score. At the end of each round, the player's score is displayed 

Candy Diamond features colorful and visually appealing graphics, as well as sound effects and music to enhance the gaming experience.  Overall, it seems like a fun and addictive puzzle game that would appeal to players who enjoy games that require strategy and quick thinking.
